overview: Are you really looking at me?  Sungyoung and her three men surrounding her. Men who say that Sung-young loved and loved him.  “There is separation and there is pain. And that's how you become more mature." Seungwon, who met purely, Janghyuk, who met fiery, and Seokmin, who was comfortable... At the center of these three men was Seongyoung. Seong-young is hurting and struggling when she meets a man. She sharpens the blade of revenge towards the men who betrayed her.
title: Dangerous Love
